toWgs84

public LatLonGeo toWgs84(LatLonGeo llg)
Converts geocentric latitude to a geodetic latitude. See Datum.toGeodeticLatitude(LatLonGeo).

NOTE: Altitude is passed through unchanged.

Specified by:
